tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Dr Naveen from day one of our daughter's birth  and now she is 15months old toddler. She is a preterm baby *** ** ****** ** **** *** **** ** *** ****** ** *** ************* **** **** ** *** *********** ********** He explains us every thing in detail, purpose of the medicine, impact of it.  He explains ever single question even tho if it's a very simple one, he still explains us with full patience. He is been helping us in up bringing a healthy child. He never suggested us any unwanted treatments . He only recommended us the nutritional food that's prepared at home and affordable food never suggested us ready to eat foods available in markets.  Being a new mom, I was asked to follow so many myths by family members but Dr Naveen explained us what is right and what is a myth. He also suggested what a new mom is supposed to eat and how much we need to eat for baby to get all the Nutrition during breastfeeding. He never rushes the parents in his consultation. He gives us all the time to question him and take clarification. He listens to us with all patience. And the best part is he takes the responsibility of vaccinating the babies. He never asks his support staff / Nurses to do that like how other Doctors do. He was responsive over a phone calls , what's app  and helped us during this pandemic alot when ever my daughter was ill due to High Grand fever, vomiting, loose stools. He gave more importance to the safety of the child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited dr Naveen for my child cough and running nose. He is so rude and unfriendly. He didn’t tell me till the end about the kid condition. I ask him so many questions about my son cough but he kept discussing things like weight, Delhi pollution, Bangalore weather, traffic. Seriously??****** **** **** *** ** **** ** ***** He was so rude to my son as well.  Also* *** **** ** * **** **** ** ** **** ***** ******** *** *** ******* ** *** ** ****** *** *** ********   Never going to visit him again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** *** *** **** **** **** * *** ** *** He literally saved my son many times. He is an extremely down to earth person. While in the world out there you see so many non genuine people, sir has treated my son so humbly . My son was a new born then and was unable to breathe.. I was so scared and   got him admitted to a private well known hospital. They could not even tell me the reason for it and asked me to keep him for 24hrs. Naveen sir gave me the right solution to it when I called him without even asking for appointment and things like that.. His suggestion saved my son again when the same situation recurred. Even in other instances when my son got jaundice he has been so patient in explaining things and taking care, I am extremely grateful to know a doctor  like him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ** ** ** **** **** * *** ** **** my son had a very weak immune system from the time of birth.. I was really worried and concerned and roamed around many hospital for a best doctor.. that's when I found Dr Naveen.. my child was 1.9 yrs old then.. and now he is 6 years old.. and even to this day I go only to Dr Naveen.. he is very friendly, helpful, concerned about the child.. he is available anytime for help and won't mind if we call him at any time for help.. thank you so much sir for all the help and support.. ** * *** **** ***************
reply_text:
Hi,
Thanks Soumya Laxmi for your warm reponse
Hope your son is doing fine.
Dr Naveen RB 
Consultant Neonatologist & Paediatrician

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Great experience with Dr. Naveen RB. Have been consulting him for my daughter since she was four months for any health issues and regular vaccination.

Doctor has helped us come out of various health issues of our daughter like frequent vomits due to bottle feed, fever reaching 101F, stomach infections etc.. He has been a great help in this covid pandemic.

Impressed by following qualities of the doctor.
1. Listens to the concerns and explains everything in detail very patiently
2. Reachable and responsive on call, WhatsApp for any emergency or anything in general
3. Enforces more and more on natural ways, home made food etc considering the long term health benefits instead of using cerelac, gripe water, ghuttis etc..as shortcuts. As he mentions in his baby diet plan "let food be thy medicine".
reply_text:
Hi Yogesh Navik
Yes " LET FOOD BE THY MEDICINE "
Thanks for your warm response
Hope your daughter is doing well
Dr Naveen RB
Consultant Neonatologist & Paediatrician

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ****** ****** ***** **** The doctor whom we had an appointment with had left for the day, so we were told to meet Dr. Naveen. This person was so rude and arrogant , he didn’t want to explain anything properly and he says ‘I don’t meet anyone once I remove my ppe kit as I don’t want to carry the disease home’. We were treated with so much disrespect and caused us a lot of humiliation. If he wanted to leave for the day and didn’t want to see anyone he could have just refused and we could’ve seen a different doctor. Very upset and dissatisfied. CloudNine should take care of these things *** *** ***** ***** ********** *** ** **** ********
reply_text:
Dear Sheetal Dixit,
Thank you for ur concern.
First The Whole World is in Corona pandemic, According to the hospital rules only One Attender is allowed inside the hospital. Attenders should wear proper mask and maintain social distancing. For both Safety of the Patients and the Hospital staff also.
My OPD timings was over & I had removed my PPE kit, the management told a walk in patient want to consult for the Vaccination.
But I still took the risk and did the consultation by wearing Facemask and Faceshield and Double glows.
Since the Lockdown has started we are allowing Only One Attender to enter inside the OPD for Safety measures.
But u started having Argument that I also want to enter the OPD along with the mother and baby to overcrowd the OPD [ 10 by 10 feet OPD room ]. As in the previous consultation other doctor had allowed to do so.
If other doctor don't follow safety measures it's risking the Doctor, Urself, Baby & Nursing Staff attending to the patient .
You were not wearing a proper mask as well which Covers both ur Nose and Mouth ( Spong mask which u were wearing is of 0% protection for Corona virus ), Ur Nose was Protruding Outside Inhaling & Exhaling the air outside Risking Urself and Hospital staff also.( As Corona is Airborne especially in closed Air-conditioned environment ) WHO World Health Organization has declared it. 
Virus can transmit upto 8 feet & keep suspended in air for many hours.
Coming to the consultation inside the OPD room. Red tape line is put on the Floor & Sticker ( One Person Only allowed Inside ) Legibly and Pictorial Foot Image also ( Any Layman can also Understand it ). 
And my OPD doors are always kept open for Proper Air Circulation. ( Since lockdown we are following the protocols in my OPD room ).
Inspite of it u were crossing the safety line and trying to touch the table risking Urself & Hospital staff for the Corona infection by Not Maintaining Social distancing.
Your baby was Preterm Born with weight of 2.03 kg but ur baby was not put on Proper Supplements, I advised u to start the Supplements and explained the mother regarding the proper growth and development. I don't know what was the reason the Supplements was not started for ur baby in the previous consultations. ( Please read the prescription )
Mother asked can she feed in Nipple bottle, I advised Nipple bottles should never be used to any baby at any point of life, use only spoon or pallada only. ( Standard Pediatric protocol ) 
These all discussions I had with the mother after the Vaccination.
You were upset ( father ) for not allowing you inside the OPD. ( Reason is to Avoid over crowding inside the 10 by 10 OPD room ) 
Next time when u visit any doctor please Wear Proper Mask and Maintain Social Distancing. It's my Sincere Advice as a doctor. Corona will not spare any one. Till now many doctors have succumbed for Corona for not taking Safety Measures. 
Till we get Vaccination & Proper Treatment Protocol. We should follow all safety measures. 
As a Responsible Citizen please follow Safety measures from now on atleast and educate others also.
Please start the Supplements as prescribed as your preterm babies require it for proper Growth and Development of Brain & Body it's already delayed. 80% myelination of brain happens in first 12 months( 1st year ), 15% myelination happens in 2nd year of life, rest 5% happens later. ( Supplements are prescribed according to standard Pediatric protocols )
All discussions in hospital was not arrogance it's for patients safety ( ie Your safety ).
I have followed all safety measures since lockdown has started & will continue to do till we come out from the CORONA Pandemic.
Hope you will also follow it in future hospital visits.
Hope I have answered ur concerns Sheetal Dixit.
At last Please consider Doctors as Human beings they also have there old aged parents & near dear once waiting at home, they risk their life and treat the society even in Pandemic.
I haven't taken a single day leave since the pandemic has started, done my duty sincerely.
Hope this reply will be helpful & educating many in the society.
Stay safe & Stay healthy for Healthy Society.

Thank you.
Dr Naveen RB

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is vijayakala, vijaya , I was a regular visitor of Dr. Naveen for my son Aaron , 1 year old , we were from kerala and was searching for a Doctor in Bangalore , Indiranagar , I have consulted many other doctors and was not that satisfied , my delivery was in kerala and gone to Bangalore once my son was 5 month old.when I started consulting Dr. Naveen I was so satisfied and was so happy that we reached one of the best clinic in Bangalore , Little Krishna .
Doctor Naveen gives a lot of care to kids and gives times to discuss detail section about the kids illness..I also started giving vaccinations from there , where I feel that my son is not getting that much pain, 
Very important thing that I need to mention is that he is the  Only Dr. Who helps us during this Covid time.
We were back to Kerala and locked here due to covid. When my son was not feeling well , we taken him to nearby clinic and taken urine test and checked the result with Dr. .... who was consulting him for 1- 2 months in Kerala , I called dr. A....to check the result with him , even he was consulting my son he ignores to talk to us during the covid situation .I was very scared to take my son to hospital as it was triple lock down in my place. I called Dr. Naveen and dr. Given some suggestions , he given instructions to follow during covid time.we always recommend Dr.Naveen..
Dr.Naveen , sir , only few doctors are there like you who gives more important to your patients/so dedicated to your work.
reply_text:
Thank you Vijayakala Vijaya for your Inspiring feedback. 
I have done my duty sincerely in these difficult Pandemic Covid time's.
Hope Little Aaron Sanal is doing fine.
Stay Safe and Healthy.
Dr Naveen RB
